item.title: WOLFSPEED INC 10-K
item.description: WOLFSPEED INC, which is in the Semiconductors & Related Devices [3674] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 22, 2022 had 32913 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: june - 400 instances company - 377 instances million - 302 instances 2022 - 301 instances 2021 - 252 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
